metadata.title: CVE-2024-27069 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ovl: relax WARN_ON in ovl_verify_area()syzbot hit an assertion in copy up data loop which looks like it isthe result of a lower file whose size is being changed underneathoverlayfs.This type of use case is documented to cause undefined behavior, soreturning EIO error for the copy up makes sense, but it should not becausing a WARN_ON assertion.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
